Innovating for a
Better Tomorrow

Rebilance is a dynamic and innovative company, driven by a team of passionate and talented people. Our goal it to create cutting-edge microbiome solutions that have the power to make a meaningful impact on the world.

Who are we?

We’re a biotechnology startup developing personalized probiotics, we are a team of biotechnological, biomedical, bioinformatics and industrial engineers and have offices and laboratories at DTU (Technical University of Denmark).

We hope to help people suffering from microbiome imbalances, as well as people suffering from its associated diseases, such as:

  • Allergies and asthma
  • Inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD)
  • Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
  • Obesity
  • Type 2 Diabetes
  • Mental conditions such as depression, anxiety, and stress

We plan on launching the first version of our product in July-September 2023.

FOLLOW US ON LINKEDIN

Join Rebilance

The development of personalized probiotics presents a complex and multifaceted challenge that requires the collaborative efforts of individuals with a diverse range of expertise, including engineering, science, and operations. As such, we are seeking individuals with a broad range of skills and experience to join our team and help tackle this interdisciplinary challenge.
